2025.query: Atlassian collaboration competitors 2025 project management DevOps tools
2025.context: Atlassian Corporation is a team collaboration and productivity software company focused on Jira, Confluence, Trello, and developer tools. Atlassian Intelligence AI. Focus on enterprise and team productivity.

competitors.name: GitLab
competitors.notes: First alternative for end-to-end DevOps management. Delivers everything from version control to CI/CD on single platform. Brings all DevOps lifecycle stages into one uniform, user-friendly interface, minimizing friction between developer and operation teams

competitors.name: GitHub
competitors.notes: Widely used platform for hosting and collaborating on code repositories with seamless integration with developer tools and vast community. Integrated capabilities for access control, bug logging, feature requests, project management, and wikis. Excellent for open-source projects

competitors.name: Azure DevOps
competitors.notes: Microsoft product providing end-to-end DevOps toolchain including Agile planning, source code management (Git), automated builds, testing tools, and release management

competitors.name: Monday.com
competitors.notes: Popular project management platform that streamlines workflows across teams. Two offerings: Monday Work Management for projects/tasks and Monday Dev for product development lifecycles

competitors.name: Asana
competitors.notes: Work management platform helping teams organize and manage work from small tasks to strategic initiatives. Stands out with clean, user-friendly interface and robust project management capabilities

competitors.name: Basecamp
competitors.notes: Project management platform for enhancing collaboration and streamlining project tracking, particularly for small teams. User-friendly interface and straightforward design make it accessible and intuitive

competitors.name: Microsoft Teams
competitors.notes: Teamwork and collaboration hub providing chat, video meetings, file storage, and user application integration. Part of Microsoft's collaborative products competing with Atlassian

competitors.name: Slack
competitors.notes: Business communication platform creating organized space for teams to interact in channels designated to different departments/tasks. Strength lies in seamless integration with many work-related tools and software

competitors.name: Nuclino
competitors.notes: More than knowledge base - unified workspace bringing team's notes, docs, and projects together in central location. Excels in facilitating collaboration and knowledge sharing within single platform

competitors.name: ServiceNow
competitors.notes: Competitor in workflow automation and collaboration space

competitors.name: Jive Software
competitors.notes: Collaboration and communication platform competitor

competitors.name: Zoho
competitors.notes: Offers project management and collaboration tools competing with Atlassian

competitors.name: Wrike
competitors.notes: Project management and collaboration platform alternative

mentionedBy.notes: Git repository integrated with Jira and Confluence

mentionedBy.name: GitLab Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Git repository management integrated with Jira and Confluence

mentionedBy.name: ServiceNow Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Popular service desk solution for IT teams, integrated with development tools

mentionedBy.name: ServiceNow Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: 5,752 employees in 2020; $1.6B in revenues; strong integration with development tools

mentionedBy.name: Smartsheet
mentionedBy.notes: Jira was Atlassian's project and issue tracking tool, primarily designed for software development teams. It was a heavyweight tool used when elaborate processes and customization were needed, particularly for agile development workflows.

mentionedBy.name: Smartsheet
mentionedBy.notes: Jira continued to dominate in software development and IT teams for issue tracking and agile project management. Atlassian completed several acquisitions in 2019-2020 including AgileCraft and Automation for Jira to strengthen its position.

mentionedBy.name: Smartsheet
mentionedBy.notes: Atlassian was recognized as a Leader in the 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Collaborative Work Management. Serving over 300,000 customers in 200+ countries, Atlassian offers Jira for project and issue tracking and Confluence for team collaboration and knowledge management.
